code:
graph TB


  subgraph FilesAndData
    Pos2
    File
    Piece
    DataTransfer
  end

  subgraph FilecoinNode
    Pos1

    P2PNode
    subgraph Repository
      Config
      IpldStore
      KeyStore
    end
    Clock
    FileStore
  end


  subgraph libraries
    Pos0

    subgraph multiformats
      multihash
      multiaddr
    end
    subgraph libp2p
      subgraph libp2pCore
        p2p.Node
        p2p.PeerID
        p2p.PeerInfo
        p2p.Node --> p2p.PeerID
        p2p.Node --> p2p.PeerInfo
      end
      subgraph libp2pProtocols
        Gossipsub
        BootstrapList
      end
    end
    subgraph ipld
      ipld.CID
      ipld.Selector
      ipld.GraphStore
    end
    subgraph ipfs
      Bitswap
      Graphsync
      UnixFS
      DagImports
    end

    Bitswap -.-> p2p.Node
    Graphsync -.-> p2p.Node
    Graphsync -.-> ipld.Selector
    Gossipsub -.-> p2p.Node
    BootstrapList -.-> p2p.Node
    p2p.PeerID -.-> multihash
    p2p.PeerInfo -.-> multiaddr
    ipld.CID-.->multihash
  end

  P2PNode -.-> p2p.Node
  IpldStore -.-> ipld.GraphStore

  Pos2 --> Pos1
  Pos1 --> Pos0

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 主架构 这一块。
